posts.title: ICT Suggestions (Class-11)
posts.content:
MCQ--

 --‡¶Ö‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶™ ‡¶•‡ßá‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶Ö‡¶ß‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü ‡ß® ‡¶è‡¶∞ ‡¶∏‡¶¨ (‡ß®‡ß´ ‡¶ü‡¶æ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá, ‡¶∏‡¶¨ ‡¶ó‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡¶æ ) ‡¶ì ‡¶Ö‡¶ß‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü ‡ß™ ( ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶á ‡¶™‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶®‡ßç‡¶§ ‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶≤‡¶æ‡¶∏ ‡¶è ‡¶™‡ßú‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßã ‡¶π‡¶á‡¶õ‡ßá)   MCQ 
--‡¶§‡ßã‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶¨‡¶á ‡¶•‡ßá‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø‡¶∏ 
 -- ‡¶°‡¶ø‡¶ú‡¶ø‡¶ü‡¶æ‡¶≤ ‡¶ì ‡¶è‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶≤‡¶ó ‡¶∏‡¶ø‡¶ó‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶≤

For CQ: 

 ‡ß®‡ßü ‡¶Ö‡¶ß‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü: ( ‡ß¨‡ß¶%  ‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶∂‡ßç‡¶®) 
-Mobile Generations(1G-5G)
-Network Topology ( Mash, Ring, Tree, Star) -Data Transmission Mode (e.g simplex) and Data Delivery Mode(e.g. Unicast)
 -Serial Transmission(e.g. Synchronous)
 - Wired Media(e.g. Twisted Pair, Co-axial Cable, Optical Fibre) and Wireless media
 - Different Waves (e.g. Radio wave..)  
 - Cloud Computing 
 

 ‡ß™‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶• ‡¶Ö‡¶ß‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü:( ‡ß™‡ß¶% ‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶∂‡ßç‡¶®)  
 - Website and Web Browser
- IP address
-Different websites (e.g. Static) 
- Website Structure (e.g. Linear, Hybrid etc.) 
-HTML Tag, Attribute, Element
- Common HTML Page
-Well known html tags ( optional)
